title: Playboy - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep.180 (Pt. 2)
description:
What does Playboy mean to us?

Thanks to Squarespace for sponsoring this episode. Go to Squarespace.com/Gameovergreggy and use promo code GOG

Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
